controls.title: Quality management system and its processes
controls.description: Establish, implement, maintain and continually improve a quality management system

controls.title: Leadership and commitment
controls.description: Top management shall demonstrate leadership and commitment to the QMS

controls.title: Quality policy
controls.description: Top management shall establish, implement and maintain a quality policy

controls.title: Organizational roles, responsibilities and authorities
controls.description: Top management shall ensure responsibilities and authorities are assigned, communicated and understood

controls.title: Actions to address risks and opportunities
controls.description: Determine risks and opportunities that need to be addressed to ensure the QMS can achieve its intended results

controls.title: Quality objectives and planning to achieve them
controls.description: Establish quality objectives at relevant functions, levels and processes

controls.title: Documented information
controls.description: The QMS shall include documented information required by the standard and determined necessary

controls.title: Operational planning and control
controls.description: Plan, implement and control processes needed to meet requirements

controls.title: Monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation
controls.description: Determine what needs to be monitored and measured, methods for monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation

controls.title: Internal audit
controls.description: Conduct internal audits at planned intervals

controls.title: Management review
controls.description: Top management shall review the QMS at planned intervals

controls.title: General - Improvement
controls.description: Determine and select opportunities for improvement and implement necessary actions

controls.title: Nonconformity and corrective action
controls.description: React to nonconformity and take action to control and correct it

controls.title: Continual improvement
controls.description: Continually improve the suitability, adequacy and effectiveness of the QMS
